nodes.text: Woshrikes were a species of dangerous creatures found on the agrarian planet of Ertegas in the Anoat sector. While growing up on Ertegas, Arro Basteren protected his family's crops from woshrikes. The activity honed his eyesight and ability to uncover and destroy enemies, skills that he later used when he joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
Woshrikes were first mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
